Package edu.ncsu.csc216.product_backlog.model.task

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.product_backlog.model.task.Task
  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating tasks and putting them inside products that they associate with. This class also contains 6 private inner classes and an interface which are used for transitioning between states.
    Author:
    Daniel Avisse

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Task.Type
      An enumeration that holds of the value of different types

        taskId - Id of the task
        title - Title of the task
        type - Type for the task
        creator - Creator of the task
        note - Note for the task
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the fields are invalid.

        state - State of the task
        title - Title of the task

        owner - Owner of the task
        verified - True or false for it task is verified
        notes - Note for the task
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the fields are invalid
